Played this growing up after the original and its still competitive and lively. Such an amazing feeling after not having played in years and coming back to packed servers and people who never stopped playing since release. counter-strike will always prevail as the BEST competitive fps game of all time.
Very friendly community and guns are pretty balanced, 8/10 more would could be done for adding weapons.
I finally can play Garry's Mod without missing textures.

made me watch alot of zombie escape videos back then feelsgoodman

I prefer that you get Counter-Strike 1.6 or Counter-Strike GO first before you buy this. This Counter-Strike game is not the best but also not the worst, There are some good things about this game like the new weapons  spray patterns and the new detailed maps and a new feature that Counter-Strike 1.6 does not have, and this is the bots. 6.5/10
i like everything by this game. Bunnyhopping is amazing :)

Try it, it is more fun then CS:GO, you can play this for 3 hours and not get bored of it, for some reason CS:GO feels like you will get bored of it in 10 minutes. It has good bhopping and speed for players, the player feels regular but CS:GO feels like you are rock hard when you move or jump. CS:S might be 16 years old, but the graphics still hold up to this day looking still okay. Toxicity is low because its not a free game, and it has a good voicechat system that sounds good. If you were to try this, reccomended to buy it.
